package.name: Cunning_Promoproduct_Add_Free_Promotional_Product_To_Cart
package.summary: Add free promotional product to cart when sub total is greater than or equal to some figure.
package.description:
This extension helps store to boost sales using free promotional products.
Promotional Products will be added automatically to cart when Cart Sub Total will be greater than or equal to decided figure.
To enable this extension, set Promotional Products & Cart Sub Total from your store back end, go to System > Configuration > Cunning > Promotional Product and make the changes.
Promotional Product Ids Here you fill products ids which you want to make promotional products. This field is comma separated, so you can also assign multiple promotional products.
Added Promotional Products will be displayed on Order Review tab on checkout page. The reason we are not showing Promotional Products on Cart Page is that customer can not change the quantity of free products manually from the Cart Page.
Note : Promotional Products must be enabled and in stock to be added as a free product.
